title: Jennifer Lopez reunites with her kids on the set of her new film Marry Me
text:
She's in the middle of filming the upcoming romantic comedy Marry Me alongside Owen Wilson.

And Jennifer Lopez got a break from the grind when her 11-year-old twins Max and Emme came to visit her on-set.

The 50-year-old Let's Get Loud songstress gave her little ones a warm embrace when she was reunited with them.

Cute: Jennifer Lopez got a break from the grind when her 11-year-old twins Max and Emme came to visit her on-set

'I ♥️ when they visit me on set!!!' she captioned a photo of the moment that garnered over 140K likes within its first 20 minutes of posting.

Marry Me centers on Lopez's character, an engaged pop star who finds out her fiancé cheated on her with her assistant - leading her to choose a random man out of the concert crowd to marry instead - Owen Wilson's character.

The film will be Lopez and Wilson's second film together since 1997's Anaconda.

On-duty: The film will be Lopez and Wilson's second film together since 1997's Anaconda

It is based on a graphic novel by Barry Crosby, and the script was penned by John Rogers and Tami Sagher in addition to a rewrite by Harper Dill.

Marry Me will be produced by STXfilms, who also collaborated with Lopez on 2018's Second Act and this year's Hustlers.

'We continue to have amazing experiences with Jennifer, Elaine and Benny with each film we collaborate on, and we’re thrilled that they wanted to work with STX again on this funny and endearing project,' STXfilms chairman Adam Fogelson said.

Glam: Marry Me will be produced by STXfilms, who also collaborated with Lopez on 2018's Second Act and this year's Hustlers

'Owen Wilson is a hilarious and charismatic addition to the film, and the perfect person to play opposite Jen in a role that was quite literally made for her.'

The star has been racking up rave reviews for her performance in Hustlers, and there is already talk that an Oscar could be in her midst.

And according to a source via HollywoodLife, Lopez is 'hopeful' that she'll get a nomination.

'Jennifer Lopez is truly having her best year yet, and she is telling those close to her that she really is hopeful that she will be nominated for an Oscar this year,' the source said.

Killing it: The star has been racking up rave reviews for her performance in Hustlers, and there is already talk that an Oscar could be in her midst

'Of course she doesn’t want to jinx it, so she’s playing it cool and being humble. But, she really does believe this is her year and she’s got a great shot at it.

'She’s telling those around her to keep her schedule clear to attend all the awards shows.'

Lopez stars with Constance Wu and Cardi B in Hustlers, which focuses on a group of strippers who join forces to dupe Wall Street brokers.
